category: Member sport group regulations/Article 10 (Quorum for decision and decision)
contents: Article 10 (Quorum for deliberations and decisions) ① Except as specifically provided for in these regulations, the general meeting shall be opened with the attendance of a majority of registered delegates, and resolutions shall be made with the approval of a majority of delegates present. In this case, the management organization is included in the number of registered delegates, but not in the number of delegates present, and cannot exercise voting rights. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ② The expulsion bill shall be proposed at the general meeting with the approval of a majority of registered delegates, and shall be resolved with the approval of more than two-thirds of registered delegates. Newly established on May 29, 2019, November 7, 2019. ③ In the case of expelling a member organization (including a national federation) pursuant to paragraph 2, the organization must be given an opportunity to explain itself prior to the resolution. Newly established on May 29, 2019, November 7, 2019, and October 6, 2021. ④ When the expulsion bill is passed, it takes effect immediately. Newly established 2019. 5. 29., 2019. 11. 7., 2021. 10. 6.
